title: Post-hot-cast annealing deposition of perovskite films with infused multifunctional organic molecules to enhance the performance of large-area light-emitting devices
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18567-18575
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02652G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ching-Ho Tien, Jun-Qing Liu, Lung-Chien Chen
A post-hot-cast annealing deposition scheme and the introduction of the multifunctional molecule 2-amino-1,3-propanediol (APDO) are proposed to regulate the crystallization of the perovskite film to enhance the performance of large-area PeLEDs.
